landing.title: Mukwasi Wo ow'Okutegeka Emmere
landing.subtitle: Tegeka emmere yo, goberera ebiruubirirwa byo eby'obulamu, era osobole okutuuka ku buzito bw'oyagala n'ebirowoozo eby'enjawulo, okujjukirwa okw'amagezi, n'engeri ey'okutasalira musango mu kulya obulungi.
landing.ctaTitle: Oli Mwetegefu Okukyusa Empisa Zo ez'Okulya?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Weyunge ne bakozesa enkumi abatuuse ku biruubirirwa byabwe eby'obulamu ne MealPlanner. Tewali kusala musango, nkulaakulana yokka.

auth.invalidCredentials: Email oba ekigambo ekyama si kituufu

dashboard.mealPlanToday: Guno gwe ntegeka yo ey'emmere ey'olwa leero. Okola bulungi!

features.calorieTrackingDesc: Goberera kkalori z'olya n'amawulire ag'obulamu buli mmere.
features.personalizedGoalsDesc: Ssaawo era otuuke ku biruubirirwa byo eby'obulamu n'enteekateeka z'emmere ezikoluddwa ku byetaago byo.
features.smartRemindersDesc: Tofiirwa mmere na njukiza za magezi n'ebirowoozo eby'okuddizaamu.
features.globalCuisineDesc: Zuula emmere ez'enjawulo okuva mu nsi yonna nga weekuuma ku ntegeka yo.
features.progressTrackingDesc: Goberera obuzito bwo n'enkulaakulana ey'obulamu n'ebiwandiiko bya buli lunaku, wiiki, n'omwezi.
features.rewardsSystemDesc: Fumba ebiwoomerera n'ennaku ez'okuwummula olw'obutakyuka bwo. Osaanira!
features.favoriteSnacksDesc: Gattako emmere gy'oyagala awatali kusoomoozebwa. Okwenkanankana kwe kifo ky'okuwangula.
features.weightManagementDesc: Goberera olugendo lwo olw'obuzito n'ebirowoozo eby'amagezi n'okujaguza ebijjuzo.
features.redFlagAlertsDesc: Fumba obujjukizi obwangu bw'ova mu kkubo, n'ebirowoozo eby'okukuyamba okudda.

trial.daysRemaining: ennaku ezisigadde mu kugezesa kwo okw'obwerere
trial.trialBenefits: Fumba okukozesa kw'obujjuvu ebintu byonna okumala ennaku 30, tewetaagisa kusasula
